title: Tootoot.fm Input Schema
description: Specify the date range for the events. You can use either the absolute date range or a relative one. If a relative date is provided, it will take precedence.

since.title: Since
since.description: The start date for the event search (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

till.title: Till
till.description: The end date for the event search (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

relativeDate.title: Relative Date Period
relativeDate.description: Specify a period starting from today (e.g., '7 days', '1 month', '2 years').
